name: Search For Meaning: White House 2001-2002
description:
The White House is an icon for democracy in the United States, a symbol that populates our cultural landscape from movies, comedy, video games, and our political now. This interactive NFT is the second in a series constructed from online debris left online over the past two decades, videos included the first 1,000 videos of searching for "White House" on Youtube. 

Pre-YouTube, we built our knowledge base from C-Span and book reviews. With the establishment of YouTube 2005 to the present, we are presented with a growing number of opinions and viewpoints that eventually give rise to fake news. The ebb and flow of political amnesia and nostalgia work together to fill in our cultural understanding of this icon.

Interactivity uses Web.gl, which may need a moment to load. The best experience is on a computer. The mouse will allow you to look around the Oval Office, the scroll wheel can zoom in and out. 

This work is utilizing edits made for Search Engine Vision The White House https://www.ericsouther.com/whitehouse
